application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required Conditions 5 (Construction Method Statement), 9 (Archaeology), 23 (BREEAM Design Stage Assessment), 33 (Air Quality Assessment) and 34 (Piling Method Statement) of planning permission 19/03167/FUL (Demolition of the two existing dwellinghouses and the erection of a part three storey, part two storey nursing home comprising 67 bedrooms with associated car parking, landscaping, refuse and bicycle store)
decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to provide sufficient information to discharge Condition 5 (Construction Management Plan) and Condition 33 (Air Quality Assessment) of planning permisssion 19/03167/FUL and ensure the safeguarding of the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and in the interests of the safety and operation of the highway network, in accordance with Policies T4 and T7 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS7 and DM9 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012 and to protect environmental health and local amenity in accordance with Policy SI1 of the London Plan 2021 and its Sustainable Design and Construction SPG.
